chat.title: Chat Assistant
chat.welcome: Hi! How can I help you today?

find-product.prompt: What product are you looking for?
find-product.no-results: No products found. Try a different search.
find-product.results: Here are some products I found:

order-product.search-prompt: What product would you like to order? Type a product name to search.
order-product.no-results: No products found. Try a different search.
order-product.select-product: Here are some products I found. Click one to order:
order-product.quantity-prompt: How many would you like to order?
order-product.enter-quantity: Please enter the quantity you want:
order-product.invalid-quantity: Please enter a valid number (1 or more).
order-product.quantity-too-high: Maximum quantity is 999. Please enter a smaller number.
order-product.confirm-prompt: Would you like to add this to your cart?
order-product.what-next: What would you like to do next?
order-product.error: Could not add to cart. Please try again.

support.prompt: I'll help you create a support ticket.
support.greeting-signed-in: I see you're already signed in. Let's get started!
support.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
support.subject-prompt: Please select a subject for your ticket:
support.message-too-short: Your message must be at least 50 characters long.
support.attachment-prompt: Would you like to add an attachment?
support.success: Your support ticket has been submitted successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
support.error: There was an error submitting your ticket:

checkout.cart-empty: Your cart is empty. Please add some products first.
checkout.cart-error: Could not load your cart. Please try again.
checkout.login-or-guest: Would you like to sign in or continue as guest?
checkout.login-error: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
checkout.guest-email-prompt: Please enter your email address for order confirmation:
checkout.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address.
checkout.card-number-prompt: Please enter your credit card number (format: 0000-0000-0000-0000):
checkout.card-expiry-prompt: Please enter the expiration date (format: MM/YYYY):
checkout.card-cvv-prompt: Please enter the CVV (3 or 4 digits):
checkout.invalid-expiry: Invalid expiration date format. Use MM/YYYY.
checkout.invalid-cvv: Invalid CVV. Must be 3 or 4 digits.
checkout.invalid-card-name: Cardholder name can only contain letters and spaces.
checkout.account-name-prompt: Please enter the account holder name:
checkout.invalid-bank-name: Bank name can only contain letters and spaces.
checkout.invalid-account-number: Account number must contain only digits.
checkout.bnpl-prompt: How many monthly installments would you like?
checkout.giftcard-number-prompt: Please enter your gift card number:
checkout.invalid-giftcard-number: Gift card number must be alphanumeric.
checkout.success: Your order has been placed successfully!
checkout.what-next: What would you like to do now?
checkout.error: There was an error processing your order:

errors.minlength: Password must be minimal 6 characters long.
errors.maxlength: Password can not be more than 40 characters long.

footer.demo-purpose: used for software testing training purpose.

overview.co2-tooltip: A = most environmentally friendly, E = higher environmental impact

contact.title: Contact

attachment.label: Attachment
attachment.help: Only files with the txt extension are allowed, and files must be 0kb.

errors.incorrect-type: File should have a txt extension.

contact.known-user: Hello {{ name }}, please fill out this form to submit your message.
contact.confirm: Thanks for your message! We will contact you shortly.

cart.title: Cart
cart.empty: The cart is empty. Nothing to display.
cart.rental-explainer: Item for rent, price per hour

sign-in.title: Sign in
sign-in.already: Hello {{ first_name }} {{ last_name }}, you are already logged in. You can proceed to checkout.

guest.title: Continue as Guest
guest.proceed: Continuing as guest: {{ first_name }} {{ last_name }} ({{ email }})

payment.title: Payment
payment.confirm: Thanks for your order! Your invoice number is {{ invoice_number }}.

bank-transfer.bank-name-error-format: Bank name can only contain letters and spaces.
bank-transfer.account-name-error-format: Account name can contain letters, numbers, spaces, periods, apostrophes, and hyphens.
bank-transfer.account-number-help: Please enter your bank account number as it appears on your bank statement. It's a unique series of numbers used to identify your individual account. Avoid including any spaces or hyphens.

credit-card.number-help: Enter your 16-digit credit card number as it appears on the card, in the format 0000-0000-0000-0000. Ensure that you include the hyphens for proper formatting.
credit-card.date-error-past: Expiration date must be in the future.
credit-card.cvv-help: The CVV is a 3-digit or 4-digit number. It's used for added security during card-not-present transactions.
credit-card.name: Card Holder Name
credit-card.name-required: Only letters and spaces are allowed.

bnpl.monthly-installments-help: This option allows you to spread the cost of your purchase over several months.
bnpl.monthly-installments-error-required: Please select the number of monthly installments.

gift-card.number-help: Enter the unique number found on your gift card. This number is usually located on the back of the card and may consist of digits and/or letters.
gift-card.number-error-format: Gift card number must be alphanumeric.
gift-card.validation-code-help: The validation code is a security feature found on your gift card, often located near the gift card number. Enter this code exactly as it appears on your card.

overview.title: My account
overview.description: Here you can manage your profile, favorites and orders.

profile.title: Profile
profile.manually_enter_key: Or manually enter this key in your app:
profile.scan_qr_code: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy):
profile.invalid_totp_code: Invalid TOTP code. Please try again.

messages.title: Messages
messages.no-messages: There are no messages yet. Navigate to the contact form and fill out the form.
messages.subject: Subject

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.no-favorites: There are no favorites yet. In order to add favorites, please go to the product listing and mark some products as your favorite.
